oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Measuring the effects of local food on a regional economy : regional agro-economic model (RegAE) - an extended input-output approach
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vihma, Antto
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study focuses on the concept of local food, from a regional and structural economics perspective. The empirical research concerns the effects of changes in foodstuff demand, food industry and agricultural production in South-Savo region, in rural eastern Finland. The research is carried out by constructing and utilising Regional agro-economic model (RegAE).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vihma, Antto (2005) Measuring the effects of local food on a regional economy : regional agro-economic model (RegAE) - an extended input-output approach. In: Sumelius, John (Ed.) Possibilities for and economic consequences of switching to local ecological recycling agriculture. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 43. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, chapter IV, pp. 51-63.
